murungagasyaye nyanissara nahimi padaname sabhapathi shri lanka bauddha ha pali wishwawidyalaye mahopadhyaya mahacharya iththademaliye indasara himi padaname adhyaksha pranshaye pradhana adhikarana sanghanayaka murungagasyaye nyanissara nahimi padaname lekam kirinde pemasiri himi, ema padaname niyojithayan wana kolambaa disa sahakara adhyaksha (piriwen) witharandeniye medhananda himi wishramalath aagamana wigamana niyojya palaka parakrama pranandu shri lanka guwan widuli sansthawe wishramalath wada satahan adhyakshaka dabliw.

bandumkara komishan sabhawe lekhana saranshaya bagatha kirim | puwath | pitu pelagasuma | galariya mahajana sambandhatha anshaya paryeshana kamaraya poth saha puwathpath liyapadinchi kirime anshaya pusthakala tayims ekathuwa pradarshana kandayam paminima thorathuru kalamanakaranaya, aarakshanaya saha sanrakshanaya lekhana aabaddha kara ganime anshaya koshtagara shrawya drushya anshaya shilpiya anshaya chayarupa anshaya danata ituwana wyapruthi sampurna kala wyapruthi wenkirima oba methanayi: mulpituwa puwath bandumkara komishan sabhawe lekhana saranshaya lekhana kanda anka 717 2015 pebarawari 01 sita 2016 marthu 31 dakwa wu kala simawa thula bhandagara bandumkara nikuthuwan pilibanda pariksha kirima, wimarshanaya kirima ha wartha kirima sandaha wu janadhipathi parikshana komishan sabhawa 1.

sunami welawe jiwithaya rakaganna anungen udaw illapu kanthawo wathuren adala aragena dushanaya karala aayeth wathuratama thallu karala damma bawa api kawuruth danna deyak.minissu ee tharamata kuriru wela ada samajaye.thawa keneku gana hithannema nathi tharamata manushya gunadharma tikin tika aath wenawa.api hamoma thula me lakshana thiyanawa.mage ee wage eka athdakimak dannamko dawasak tawun ekedi mama dakka ek kanthawak tikak kalabalen wage paradige awidagena ena athare thaman issarahata ena ayata monawado kiyala monawa hari illanawa wage.me kanthawa mage lagatath aawa.magen illuwe sulu mudalak.eyage awurudu hathaka punchi duwa rohale nathara karala innawa.godak asanipayi.famasiyen rupiyal thunsiyak wage mila wena beheth wagayak ganna wela thiyanawa eeth athe salli na.duwata kanna dennawath monawath ganna salli na kiwwa.mama wishwasa kale na.eeth rupiyal wissak dunna.passe mama rupiyal pansiyaka withara intarnet kad milata ganna kadayakata giya.ee welawe mata hithuna ara kanthawa kiwwe aththakda danne na mama nikarune net ekata wiyadam karana me mudalin kenekuta beheth tikak aragena dena eka hodayine kiyala hithala ara kanthawa innawada kiyala tikak hoyala baluwa.eeth hitiye na.inpasse mama hithuwa hospitl ekata yanna.eeth leddu balanna thawa payak wage thiyana nisa mage anith wada tika karagena welawa aawama lama wattuwata giya.mama tikak sodisi karala balanakota ara kanthawa adak laga innawa.mama eyala lagata giya.punchi daruwata hodatama una.aswala kadulu pirila.balannawath enna tharami kenek na.(hasband meyala dala gihilla wena kenek badala).mama ahuwa beheth gaththada kiyala.salli hoyaganna bariwuna.podi eka thaniyama thiyanna bari hinda ikmanata aawa kiwa.mama beheth ganna salli dunna.ee kanthawa loku balaporoththuwak ishtawuna wage thadin husmak gaththa.api lagata udawwak balagena ena aya athare mehema aththatama asarana wela ena ki deneknam athida ?..eeth api ee gana thakimak karanne naneda.eda mama unath passe nikamata hithuna nisane balanna giye.anika rohala lagama thibuna nisa. dud..ara thaththayi me ammayi dennama ekawagema eda asaranayi.ee dennama me dewal kale daruwa wenuwen.eeth ithin minissunta mokatada anith ayage asaranakam.aththenma api hamoma gewanne aathmarthakami jiwitha.
